ModMetaData.name: Cats!
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy (l2032)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds several breeds of domestic and wild cats to the game. Features: Domestic Cats - Maine Coon - Miniature Maine Coon - European Shorthair - Norwegian Forest Cat - British Shorthair - Siamese (Thanks to Lokidemon)
Wild Cats - Lion (Huge thanks to Lokidemon for both sets of textures) - Tiger
Other Things - Processed cat food and a feeding bowl
